articles.title: White House says Russia laying groundwork to annex Ukraine territory - Reuters
articles.description: Russia is laying the groundwork for the annexation of Ukrainian territory and is installing illegitimate proxy officials in areas there under its control as it seeks to exert total control over its gains in the east, the White House said on Tuesday.
